name: Monster Dentist Doctor - Free Fun Dental Hospital Games
name_original: Monster Dentist Doctor - Free Fun Dental Hospital Games
description:
There are monsters in your clinic, Please play this game and help those baby monsters so they feel well after cleaning their teeth.

Look at those little buddies, waiting for your help, Take care of them.

AMAZING FEATURES:
*CRAZY Tools to get rid of cavities!
* Awesome fun sounds.
* Tooth Decay! Yank those ugly teeth!
* Bad Breath! Pew! Spray away the bad breath!
* Shine up their teeth with a toothbrush!
* Add some sparkling GRILLZ!
* Fun trinkets for their braces!
* Mini FUN GAMES inside!

DOWNLOAD TODAY and take care of monster.

Please rate our game with your valuable feedback, we would love to hear from you!!

Thanks.
